      • World

        public World​(java.lang.String currentLevel)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for the World class. Initialises the starting conditions of each level.
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - name of the current level to be generated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case there is no .lvl file with the same name as currentLevel
